description: Temporary use of land (until 31st December 2008) for the storage of building material.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The use hereby permitted shall be for a limited time-period commencing from the date of this planning permission and expiring on the 31st December 2008.  Planning permission shall be personal to Laing O'Rourke Costain Joint Venture (in connection with the refurbishment/construction of Kings Cross Station, Eastern Range building) and shall not ensure for the benefit of the land (nor of any other company) and upon the aforementioned ceasing to use the site for the purpose hereby permitted all materials, containers, structures and equipment brought onto the site in connection with its use shall be removed completely and the site shall revert back to its original use. 

REASON: The use is such that the Council is only prepared to grant permission personally to Laing O'Rourke Costain (in connection with the refurbishment/construction of Kings Cross Station, Eastern Range) and for a limited period.
